[I AM REPOSTING THIS, SEEMS IT WAS MISSED LAST TIME]


> <OLD>
>
> Hydras smiled ina wicked way and said "Do you like my respect? YOU MUST TO
> EARN IT"
>
> without previous warning Hydras Spread his multiple heads and started the
> attack

<NEW>

HYDRAS' suprise attack caught MEGASTORM full in the chest, sending the
PREDACON Duke of Destruction back a step and then two as took the full
force of it.

MAX-B stepped foward to protect MEGASTORM when HELLSCREAM placed a
hand on his shoulder.

"Roger?" MAX-B said in confusion.

"Yeah, what gives?" THRUSTOR said as he and DIRGEGUN looked at HELLSCREAM.

HELSTORM gestured at HYDRAS and the explosion. "You heard the mech,
Megatorm has to earn it." He chuckled evilly.

Meanwhile the smoke cleared from HYDRAS' attack MEGASTORM stood!

Burn marks on were on his chest and torso plating but he seemed
otherwise unhurt, "You dare attack me, MEGASTORM!" He said as he drew
to his full height, his massive shoulder mounted cannon orienting on
HYDRAS as the weapon came to full power!

"I need to earn nothing, I take it!" And with that MEGASTORM's cannon
fired a beam of pure energy at HYDRAS!

(TAG)

- Preston
